import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {Form, Button, Table} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import {listUser} from '../store/actions/user' const userListScrean = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userList = useSelector(state => state.user) const {loading, error, users} = userList useEffect( () => { dispatch(listUser()) }, [dispatch]) const deleteHandle = (id) => { console.log("done") } return (

Users

{loading ? : error ? {error}: ( {users.map(user => ( ))}
ID NAME E-MAIL Admin
{user.name} {user.email} {user.isAdmin ? ( ): ( )}
)}
) } export default userListScrean
